source_sentence: 大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無
translation: twelve deities of the great auspicious heavenly maidens are one hundred and eight names that are nonexistent

source_sentence: 垢大乘經
translation: Great Vehicle Sutra on Defilement

source_sentence: 開府儀同三司特進試鴻臚卿肅國
translation: The founding officials of the monastery were the same as the three ministers, and they specially testified to the sovereignty of Hongqian's kingdom.

source_sentence: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空諡大鑒
translation: 3,000 families of the gongshou community were given purple as a gift to the minister Kongqian Dajian.

source_sentence: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門
translation: He was the Sanzang shaman of Daegwangzhi Daxingshansi.

source_sentence: 不空奉　詔譯
translation: Amoghapāśa interpretation of the imperial edict

source_sentence: 如是我聞。
translation: Thus have I heard.

source_sentence: 一時薄伽梵。
translation: One time, Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 住安樂世界。
translation: They live in the world of peace and comfort.

source_sentence: 與大菩薩眾。
translation: He's with the great bodhisattva congregation.

source_sentence: 所謂觀自在菩薩。
translation: It's called the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 得大勢菩薩。
translation: They'll attain the great power bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 除一切蓋障菩薩。
translation: He's a bodhisattva who removes all the hindrances and hindrances.

source_sentence: 地藏菩薩。
translation: Earth-Store Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 普光菩薩。
translation: Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 虛空藏菩薩。
translation: Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 金剛手菩薩除一切怖畏菩薩。
translation: Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva is the bodhisattva who removes all fears.

source_sentence: 持一切清淨吉祥菩薩。
translation: He holds all the pure and auspicious bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 持一切福相菩薩。
translation: The bodhisattva who maintains all the marks of merit.

source_sentence: 持日月三世菩薩。
translation: He's the bodhisattva who maintains the three worlds of the sun and moon.

source_sentence: 文殊師利菩薩。
translation: Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 如是等菩薩摩訶薩而為上首。
translation: Such bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and so forth are the highest leaders.

source_sentence: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: It was then that the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 往詣世尊所頭面禮足退坐一面。
translation: He went to the Bhagavān, bowed his head and feet, withdrew, and sat to one side.

source_sentence: 時大吉祥天女亦往詣佛所頭面禮足。
translation: The great auspicious celestial maiden then also went to the Buddha and bowed her head and feet.

source_sentence: 圍繞。
translation: Surrounded by them.

source_sentence: 無量百千匝及禮一切安樂世界所住菩薩退坐一面。
translation: Countless hundreds of thousands of times, he bowed to all the bodhisattvas who lived in the peaceful world and withdrew to sit at one side.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊見吉祥天女。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān saw the auspicious goddess.

source_sentence: 有無量百千福莊嚴。
translation: There are measureless hundreds of thousands of merits and adornments.

source_sentence: 俱胝如來圍繞。
translation: Kauṇḍinya is surrounded by the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 一切釋梵護世讚揚稱歎。
translation: All the Śākyamuni Brahma protects the world and praises and extols it.

source_sentence: 以大梵音告觀自在菩薩摩訶薩言。
translation: He addressed the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Avalokitêśvara in the great Sanskrit voice, saying.

source_sentence: 觀自在菩薩若有國王王子比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷婆羅門剎利毘舍首陀。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, suppose there are kings, princes, monks, nuns, laymen, laymen, brahmans, kṣatriyas, and piśācīs.

source_sentence: 若受持大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無垢讚歎。
translation: If he receives the twelve deeds and one hundred and eight names of the great auspicious celestial maidens, they'll praise them without stain.

source_sentence: 其王剎利國界所有眾生。
translation: It's the sentient beings in the king's boundary of the country of Śāriputra.

source_sentence: 一切怖畏逼惱並皆消除。
translation: All fears and oppressions are all removed.

source_sentence: 一切怨賊人非人怖亦不為害。
translation: All the enemies, thieves, and people who aren't afraid of people won't harm them.

source_sentence: 一切財穀皆悉豐饒。
translation: All his possessions and grains are abundant.

source_sentence: 吉祥天女於彼王剎利宅中常所居止。
translation: The auspicious goddess always stayed at that king's kṣatriya's house.

source_sentence: 時彼菩薩摩訶薩說如是言。
translation: The bodhisattva Mahāsattva then spoke these words.

source_sentence: 善哉善哉世尊妙說此語。
translation: Good, good, Bhagavān! The Bhagavān marvelously explains these words.

source_sentence: 若有持吉祥天女名號。
translation: Suppose there's the name of the goddess who holds the name of the auspicious goddess.

source_sentence: 彼獲如是福利。
translation: They'll attain such benefits.

source_sentence: 時無畏觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: It's then that the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva of fearlessness observes it freely.

source_sentence: 即白佛言世尊。
translation: He then said to the Buddha, Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 吉祥天女曾於何處種植善根。
translation: Where did the auspicious goddess once plant good roots?

source_sentence: 佛言彼於恒河沙如來應供正遍知處。
translation: The Buddha said, 'That's the place where the Tathāgata should make offerings to the Tathāgata of the Ganges River that are perfectly pervasive.'

source_sentence: 種植善根。
translation: He plants good roots.

source_sentence: 無畏觀自在菩薩我念過去世。
translation: The fearless Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva is mindful of my past lives.

source_sentence: 於寶生世界。
translation: It's in the world of the jewel-generating world.

source_sentence: 寶花功德海吠琉璃金山金光明吉祥如來應供正遍知。
translation: The jeweled flower-merit ocean of merit, Vaiśravaṇa, the auspicious Tathāgata with the golden radiance of the gold mountain, should be offered as a correct and pervasive knowledge.

source_sentence: 出興於世。
translation: It's produced in the world.

source_sentence: 大吉祥天女於彼種植善根。
translation: The great auspicious goddess planted good roots there.

source_sentence: 及餘多如來所。
translation: It's also the place where many other tathāgatas live.

source_sentence: 由稱如是如來名號。
translation: It's because he calls them thus the names of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 此大吉祥天女作成就善根。
translation: This great auspicious goddess has accomplished the good roots.

source_sentence: 此諸如來常隨逐大吉祥天女。
translation: These tathāgatas always follow the great auspicious goddess.

source_sentence: 能脫一切罪。
translation: He's able to free himself from all sins.

source_sentence: 除滅一切煩惱。
translation: It removes all afflictions.

source_sentence: 令一切身作無垢。
translation: He causes all his bodies to become spotless.

source_sentence: 召集增益一切財穀。
translation: He summoned all the wealth and grains to increase.

source_sentence: 能除貧窮。
translation: He's able to remove poverty.

source_sentence: 能攝召一切天龍藥叉羅剎乾闥婆阿脩羅迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅伽。
translation: It can summon all the gods, dragons, yakṣas, rājas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas.

source_sentence: 能息一切逼惱諍訟鬪戰。
translation: He's able to stop all the oppressions, disputes, and fights.

source_sentence: 能成辦六波羅蜜所謂。
translation: It's called the accomplishment of the six perfections.

source_sentence: 南無吉祥密如來
translation: Homage to the auspicious and esoteric Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無恒河一切津口吉慶吉祥如來
南無栴檀花威星光吉祥如來
translation: Namo gandharva majestic star shining auspicious tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無普遍照曜勝鬪戰吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Universally Illuminating, Radiant, victorious, fighting, and auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無功德海照曜曼茶羅吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Maṇḍala Auspicious Tathāgata, who shines brightly like the ocean of merit.

source_sentence: 南無法神通幢進吉祥如來
translation: south, there's the Tathāgata who doesn't have a miraculous supernormal banner and advances to the auspicious sign

source_sentence: 南無曜寂靜香照曜吉祥如來
translation: Namu Yao's quiescence, fragrance, illumination, and auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無眾生意樂寂靜身吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Auspicious of the Tranquil body of business and happiness of all living beings

source_sentence: 南無願海吉祥如來
translation: south is the wish-granting ocean of vows of the auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無妙遍稱讚名號吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Marvelous Universally Praised Name-and-Formated Auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無不退輪寶處吉祥如來
translation: South is the auspicious Tathāgata of the irreversible wheel-turning jeweled place

source_sentence: 南無日輪照曜踴起吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Sun-wheel Shining Radiantly and Producing Auspiciousness

source_sentence: 南無無數精進妙住吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata of Incalculable Energy, the Marvelously Abiding Auspicious One

source_sentence: 南無無量善住吉祥如來
translation: Namu immeasurable well-abiding auspicious tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無音聲支分吉祥如來
translation: south is the Tathāgata Auspicious Part of the Sound-Figrant branch of the Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無般若燈無數光幢吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Prajñāpāramitā-pradīpa, the Tathāgata with the Banner of Immeasurable Light

source_sentence: 南無那羅延禁戒甲冑吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Nārāyaṇa-forbidden precepts armor auspicious tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無梵吉祥如來
translation: Namo Brahmakāyika-tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無摩醯首羅吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Mahêśvara

source_sentence: 南無日月吉祥如來
translation: Namo Sun and Moon Auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無甚深法光王吉祥如來
translation: south is the Tathāgata of the Profound Dharma-Shining King Auspicious,

source_sentence: 南無虛空燈現喜吉祥如來
translation: Namu Ākāśagarbha Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無日光幢吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Sun-Shining Banner Auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無香燈吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Sugandhakūṭa

source_sentence: 南無海藏生吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata of the Auspicious Arising from the Oceanic Treasury

source_sentence: 南無變化雲妙聲吉祥如來
translation: Namo changeless cloud of marvelous sound auspicious tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無一切照曜嚴吉祥如來
translation: Namo 一切照曜嚴吉祥如來如來, Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無樹王增長吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the tree king grows auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無寶焰山吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Jewel-Flamed Mountain Auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無智焰海吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata of the Ocean of Wisdom and Flames, the Auspicious One

source_sentence: 南無大願進吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Mahāprajāpatīṃśavartin

source_sentence: 南無大雲吉祥如來
translation: *Mahāmegha Great Cloud Auspicious Tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無念幢王吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata of the Auspicious Mindfulness Banner King

source_sentence: 南無帝幢幡王吉祥如來
translation: Namo emperor-tathāgata, the auspicious tathāgata who is the banner king of buddhas

source_sentence: 南無鉤召一切財穀吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Who summoned all the wealthy and grain auspicious tathāgatas

source_sentence: 南無鉤召寂靜吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata Hook-and-shoulder quiescent auspicious tathāgata

source_sentence: 南無鉤召吉慶吉祥如來
translation: Homage to the Tathāgata hook-and-shoulder, the auspicious and fortunate tathāgata

source_sentence: 如是如來名號。
translation: Thus is the Tathāgata's name.

source_sentence: 若有恭敬受持讀誦者。
translation: Suppose there's someone who respectfully receives, retains, recites, and recites it.

source_sentence: 彼善男子善女人。
translation: That good man or woman.

source_sentence: 得發生甚多福聚。
translation: They'll attain a great deal of merit that arises.

source_sentence: 一切如來授記大吉祥天女。
translation: All the Tathāgatas give assurance to the great auspicious goddess.

source_sentence: 汝當於吉祥寶莊嚴世界成等正覺。
translation: You will become perfectly enlightened in the world of the auspicious treasure adornment.

source_sentence: 號吉祥摩尼寶生如來應供正遍知。
translation: He's called the Auspicious Maṇi Jewel-Arising Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings and Perfectly Enlightened.

source_sentence: 其世界種種天寶以為莊嚴。
translation: The world is adorned with various celestial treasures.

source_sentence: 於彼世界。
translation: In that world.

source_sentence: 唯此如來作光明。
translation: Only this is the Tathāgata who creates light.

source_sentence: 彼菩薩眾於彼佛世界中。
translation: Those bodhisattvas are present in that Buddha's world.

source_sentence: 自然光明壽命無量。
translation: Their natural light has an immeasurable life span.

source_sentence: 從空演出佛法僧音聲。
translation: From emptiness, he produces the sounds of buddhas, dharmas, and saṃgha.

source_sentence: 所有菩薩於彼佛世界生者。
translation: All the bodhisattvas who are born in that Buddha's world.

source_sentence: 一切皆蓮華臺化生。
translation: All of them are born by transformation at the lotus-flower dais.

source_sentence: 云何十二契一百八名無垢讚歎。
translation: What are the twelve deeds and one hundred and eight names that are praised by the unsullied?

source_sentence: 無畏觀自在汝今諦聽。
translation: Fearlessly observing it freely, listen closely now.

source_sentence: 所謂。
translation: It's called that.

source_sentence: 一切如來所灌頂(一)　一切如來母(二)　一切天母(三)　一切如來吉祥(四)　一切菩薩吉祥(五)　一切賢聖聲聞緣覺吉祥(六)　梵毘紐摩醯首羅吉祥(七)　一切天上首吉祥(八)　一切處到吉祥(九)　一切天龍藥叉羅剎乾闥婆阿脩羅迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅伽吉祥(十)　一切持金剛手持金剛吉祥(十一)　四王護世吉祥(十二)　八曜二十八宿吉祥(十三)　唵娑尾怛哩(十四)　馱怛哩摩多(去十五)　四明吉祥(十六)　吉祥鬼母(十七)　勝(十八)　最勝(十九)　恒河(二十)　一切津(二十一)　一切吉慶(二十二)　無垢吉祥(二十三)　一切除罪(二十四)　無逸(二十五)　月吉祥(二十六)　日吉祥(二十七)　一切曜吉祥(二十八)　乘師子(二十九)　百千俱胝頻婆羅蓮華莊嚴(三十)　蓮華(三十一)　大蓮華(三十二)　蓮華座(三十三)　蓮華藏(三十四)　持蓮華(三十五)　具蓮華(三十六)　無量寶光明(三十七)　施財(三十八)　白(三十九)　大白蓮華(四十)　白臂(四十一)　持一切吉慶(四十二)　莊嚴一切福身(四十三)　調柔者(四十四)　百千臂(四十五)　百千眼(四十六)　百千頭(四十七)　持種種間錯摩尼冠(四十八)　妙色(四十九)　種種色(五十)　名稱(五十一)　極名稱(五十二)　寂靜(五十三)　貳母多(五十四)　清淨髮(五十五)　月光(五十六)　日光(五十七)　作端嚴(五十八)　一切有情對面吉祥(五十九)　聖者(六十)　依花(六十一)　花自在(六十二)　一切須彌山王吉祥(六十三)　一切江河吉祥(六十四)　一切海水吉祥(六十五)　一切津口吉祥(六十六)　一切藥草樹財穀吉祥(六十七)　施金(六十八)　施飲食(六十九)　色清淨身(七十)　色者(七十一)　一切如來自在者(七十二)　一切天眾對面吉祥(七十三)　焰摩水天俱尾羅嚩(平)娑嚩上首吉祥(七十四)　與者(七十五)　食者(七十六)　威光(七十七)　具威光(七十八)　豐饒(七十九)　榮盛(八十)　增長(八十一)　高遷(八十二)　法吉祥(八十三)　依春(八十四)　俱牟陀藏(八十五)　慈悲者(八十六)　依丈夫身(八十七)　一切清淨吉慶手(八十八)　除一切不吉祥者(八十九)　鉤召一切福吉祥(九十)　一切地王吉祥(九十一)　一切持明吉祥(九十二)　一切鬼藥叉羅剎餓鬼毘舍遮鳩槃茶摩睺羅伽吉祥(九十三)　一切天宮諸天吉祥(九十四)　一切念誦護摩吉祥(九十五)　曜極喜(九十六)　福德遊戲(九十七)　一切仙清淨吉祥(九十八)　一切吉祥(九十九)　一切宮殿尊勝吉祥(一百)　一切緊那羅吉祥(一百一)　一切日勝吉祥(一百二)　無罪處流者(一百三)　音樂(一百四)　適悅者(一百五)　俱尾羅(一百六)　愛者(一百七)　法王吉祥(一百八)如上一百八名真言曰。
translation: 一切如來所灌頂(一) 一切如來所灌頂(一) 一切如來母(二) 一切天母(三) 一切如來吉祥(四) 一切菩薩吉祥(五) 一切賢聖聲聞緣覺吉祥(六) 梵毘紐摩醯首羅吉祥(七) 一切天上首吉祥(八) 一切處到吉祥(九) 一切天龍

source_sentence: 唵微路迦(上)耶多羅耶(一)慕者耶薩嚩耨契毘藥(二合二)薩嚩補尼耶(二合三)三婆(去)囉那摩(上)目企(平)俱嚕(四)娑嚩(二合)訶(引)唵凝(上)哦薩嚩底(丁以反)[口*栗]他(二合)目企(平)娑嚩訶唵娑尾怛哩娑嚩訶薩嚩莽哦攞馱哩尼娑嚩訶遮咄吠(二合)那薩嚩諾朅沙(二合)怛囉(二合)櫱囉(二合)訶哦拏地母[口*栗]低(二合三)帶曳(二合)娑婆訶沒囉(二合)唅摩(二合)耶娑嚩訶尾瑟弩(二合)微(開口呼)娑嚩訶嚕[木*奈]囉(二合)耶娑嚩訶尾濕嚩目佉耶娑嚩訶唵仡里(二合)儞仡里(二合)儞(一)薩嚩迦哩耶(二)僧娑達儞(三)悉儞悉儞(四)儞儞儞儞(五)阿洛乞灑弭(四合)咩那舍耶(六)阿嚩訶泥微(七)室哩(二合)微室囉末拏耶(八)娑嚩訶蘇靺[口*栗]拏(二合)馱那馱儞耶(二合)羯哩瑟尼娑嚩訶薩嚩布尼耶(二合)羯哩瑟尼娑嚩訶室哩泥(去)嚩多羯哩瑟尼娑嚩訶薩嚩播波奢末尼娑嚩訶薩嚩(引)洛乞瑟彌(四合)鉢囉(二合)奢末尼娑嚩訶薩嚩怛儞櫱多(引)毘色羯他曳娑嚩訶薩嚩泥靺多(引)鉢囉(二合)目佉室哩曳娑嚩訶阿欲(重呼)摩(上)囉靺哩拏(二合)迦羅曳娑嚩訶薩嚩波尾怛囉莽薩囉訶薩多曳娑嚩訶僧(息之反平)質嚩(上)呬儞曳(二合)娑嚩訶波(上)娜三步多娑嚩訶薩嚩吉哩爹(一)迦區(開口重呼)[口*栗]娜尾娜尸尼(上)曳(二合)娑嚩訶無畏觀自在菩薩。
translation: 微路迦(上)耶多羅耶(一)慕者耶薩契毘藥(二合二)薩補尼耶(二合三)三婆(去)囉那摩(上)目企(平)俱嚕(四)娑(二合)訶(引)凝(上)哦薩底(丁以反)[口*栗]他(二合)目企

source_sentence: 此大吉祥真言及以一百八名號。
translation: These are the great auspicious true words and the one hundred and eight names.

source_sentence: 能除一切煩惱。
translation: It's able to remove all afflictions.

source_sentence: 能摧一切罪。
translation: It's able to destroy all sins.

source_sentence: 能鉤召一切福。
translation: They can hook and summon all merits.

source_sentence: 能除一切不祥。
translation: It's able to remove all inauspiciousness.

source_sentence: 能鉤召一切福德。
translation: He's able to hook and summon all merits.

source_sentence: 若有人受持讀誦及諸如來名號者。
translation: Suppose there's someone who memorizes, recites, and names the names of the tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 彼當早起於一切佛。
translation: They will soon arise in all the buddhas.

source_sentence: 燒香及花供養。
translation: They burn incense and flowers to make offerings.

source_sentence: 為吉祥天女。
translation: She's the auspicious goddess.

source_sentence: 應燒檀香應讀此經。
translation: You should burn sandalwood incense and read this sūtra.

source_sentence: 其人不久獲得一切吉祥一切安樂喜悅。
translation: Soon, that person will attain the happiness and joy of all the auspicious things.

source_sentence: 一切天擁護一切事業悉得成就。
translation: All the gods will embrace all works and attain their accomplishment.

source_sentence: 佛說是經已。
translation: After the Buddha taught this sūtra, he said.

source_sentence: 觀自在菩薩摩訶薩及大吉祥天女。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva and the great auspicious celestial maiden.

source_sentence: 一切大眾聞佛所說。
translation: All the masses heard what the Buddha taught.

source_sentence: 皆大歡喜信受奉行。
translation: They all rejoiced greatly and believed it, accepted it, and upheld it.

source_sentence: 大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無垢大乘經◎唵(一)怛儞也(二合)他尾路(引)迦野跢囉野(二)謨(引)者野(三)薩嚩耨契毘藥(二合四)薩嚩補尼野(二合五)糂(素感切)婆(去聲)囉曩(引)麼(引六)目契矩嚕娑嚩(二合引)訶(引七)唵(八)凝誐(魚迦切引九)薩嚩底(丁逸切十)佗目企娑嚩(二合引)訶(引十一)唵(十二)娑(引)尾底哩(二合)娑嚩(二合引)訶(引十三)薩嚩瞢誐攞(十四)馱(引)哩抳娑嚩(二合)訶(十五)者咄吠娜(十六)薩嚩諾乞叉(二合)怛囉(二合十七)蘖囉(二合)訶誐拏(引)地慕帶曳(二合)娑嚩(二合引)訶(十八)沒囉(二合)紇麼(二合)野娑嚩(二合引)訶(十九)尾瑟努(二合)吠娑嚩(二合)訶(二十)嚕捺囉(二合)野娑嚩(二合引)訶(二十一)尾濕嚩(二合)目佉野(引)娑嚩(二合引)訶(二十二)唵(二十三)儗里(二合)寧(上聲)儗里(二合)寧(二十四)薩嚩迦(引)哩也(二合)僧娑(引)馱寧(二十五)私(息夷切下同)寧私寧(上聲二十六)寧寧寧寧(並上聲二十七)阿攞乞史弭(三合)茗曩(引)捨野(二十八)阿(引)嚩訶泥尾室唎(二合二十九)吠室囉(二合)麼拏(引)野娑嚩(二合引)訶(引三十)蘇(上聲)[革*(蔑-戍+戊)]拏馱(上聲)曩(三十一)馱(引)寧夜(二合)羯灑抳娑嚩(二合引)訶(引三十二)薩嚩補尼夜(二合)羯灑抳娑嚩(二合引)訶(引三十三)室唎(二合)泥(上聲)嚩跢羯灑抳薩嚩(二合引)訶(引三十四)薩嚩播(引)跛(三十五)曩捨寧(上)薩嚩(二合引)訶(引三十六)薩嚩(引)攞乞史弭(三合引三十七)鉢囉(二合)捨麼寧(上聲)娑嚩(二合引)訶(引三十八)薩嚩怛佗(引)誐跢毘色跢曳(引)娑嚩(二合引)訶(引三十九)薩嚩泥嚩跢毘色跢曳薩嚩(二合引)訶(引四十)薩嚩泥嚩跢(引)鉢囉(二合)目佉(四十一)室哩(二合)曳(引)娑嚩(二合引)訶(引四十二)阿欲麼攞(四十三)[(廿\/申)*蔑]拏迦囉(引)曳(引)娑嚩(二合引)訶(引四十四)薩嚩跛尾怛囉(二合四十五)瞢誐囉訶娑跢(二合)曳(引)娑嚩(二合引)訶(引四十六)僧(息孕切)賀嚩(引)呬奈曳娑嚩(二合引)訶(引四十七)跛納麼(二合)三步跢(引)曳娑嚩(二合引)訶(引四十八)薩嚩訖哩(二合)丁也(二合四十九)迦屈(引)娜(五十)尾曩(引)施奈曳娑嚩(二合引)訶(引五十一)
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra of the Twelve Deities and One Hundred and Eight Names of the Great Auspicious Goddesses ◎(a)也(二合)他尾路(引)迦野囉野(二)(引)者野(三)薩契毘藥(二合四)薩補尼野(二合五)(素
